trans-unit.source: Provides data for the paint events of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i dati per gli eventi di disegno del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> object is used to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> oggetto utilizzato per impostare le proprietà del grafico durante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> gli eventi del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A> property allows you to position chart elements, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property facilitates GDI+ drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A> proprietà consente di posizionare gli elementi del grafico e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> proprietà semplifica le operazioni di disegno GDI+.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> property gives the developer access to the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, which can be used to set various properties of the chart.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> proprietà offre allo sviluppatore di accedere alla radice <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> oggetto, che può essere utilizzato per impostare diverse proprietà del grafico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> property allows the developer to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> proprietà consente allo sviluppatore di impostare le proprietà del grafico durante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> gli eventi del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> for the event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> per l'evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the hart element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che rappresenta l'elemento del grafico.

trans-unit.source: Use this object property during a painting event to:
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà dell'oggetto durante un evento di disegno per:

trans-unit.source: Help with the conversion to and from relative and/or absolute chart coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Supporto per la conversione da e verso le coordinate del grafico relativo e/o assoluto.

trans-unit.source: Perform custom drawing using a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Eseguire il disegno personalizzato utilizzando un GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use this object property during a painting event to position a chart element.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà dell'oggetto durante un evento di disegno per posizionare un elemento del grafico.
